txt.en: The fearsome two-headed troll Grush-and-Flak has been attacking a wide array of troops throughout the countryside. Find the creature and drive it from the battlefield.
'The fearsome two-headed troll Grush-and-Flak has been routed, bringing some stability to the region.\n\n'Thank you kindly for this dangerous work.'
Let Hlóthi know that Grush-and-Flak has been driven off.
A fearsome two-headed troll named Grush-and-Flak has been routing a wide array of troops throughout the countryside. Find the creature and drive it from the battlefield.

Within the troops pushing towards our encampment, the monstrous two-headed troll Grush-and-Flak has battered the forces of the Gabil'akkâ throughout the region. This horrific beast is said to have consumed several patrols during its reign of terror.
A fearsome two-headed troll Grush-and-Flak has been attacking a wide array of troops throughout the countryside. Find the creature and drive it from the battlefield.
